about_the_game:
The game is available now as Early Access on the Meta Quest store!

Become a top-class striker in an immersive football experience, where you score breathtaking headers against world-class defenders and goalkeepers. 

Key Features:

  • Be the Scorer: Score headers in various situations and bring victory to your team.

  • Dynamic Defenders & Goalkeepers: Face off against smart CPU opponents who will do everything to stop your headers. You have to quickly assess their positions and the trajectory of the ball to make decisions on where to place the ball to maximize your scoring chances. 

  • Realistic Ball Heading Physics: We spent a lot of time developing our physics engine, featuring drag, Magnus effect, and precise collision detection for an authentic heading simulation.

  • 32 national team outfits: Select your costume and matchball.

Game Modes:

  • Arcade Mode: Keep the goals coming and maintain scoring combos to get as many points as possible! Aim for the top corners to earn bonus points. Compete with others on a global leaderboard.

  • Match Mode: Your team is down 0-2. Make the most of your chances to turn the game around and win.

  • Practice Arena: Hone your heading skills with different types of drill to practice.

  • Tournament Mode: Compete in an international football tournament and bring home the ultimate trophy!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: I5 10400f or better
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: I5 13400f
  • Graphics: RTX 3060ti or better
  • Storage: 3 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
